import React from 'react'; import { FaThermometerHalf, FaCogs, FaIndustry, FaLeaf, FaCheckCircle, FaChartLine, FaTools } from 'react-icons/fa'; const HeatExchangerPage = () => { const heatExchangerTypes = [ { icon: , title: "Shell & Tube Heat Exchangers", description: "Most common type for high-pressure and high-temperature applications with excellent heat transfer efficiency.", applications: ["Chemical Processing", "Power Generation", "Oil & Gas", "Industrial Heating"] }, { icon: , title: "Plate Heat Exchangers", description: "Compact design with high heat transfer coefficients, ideal for low to medium pressure applications.", applications: ["Food Processing", "HVAC Systems", "Chemical Industry", "Refrigeration"] }, { icon: , title: "Air Cooled Heat Exchangers", description: "Use ambient air for cooling, eliminating water requirements and reducing environmental impact.", applications: ["Power Plants", "Refineries", "Chemical Plants", "Remote Locations"] } ]; const heatExchangerServices = [ { icon: , title: "Design & Sizing", description: "Custom heat exchanger design optimized for your specific thermal requirements" }, { icon: , title: "Performance Analysis", description: "Comprehensive analysis of heat transfer performance and efficiency" }, { icon: , title: "Optimization", description: "Maximize heat transfer efficiency and minimize energy consumption" }, { icon: , title: "Energy Recovery", description: "Implement heat recovery systems to reduce energy costs and environmental impact" } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Heat Exchanger Engineering

Specialized heat exchanger design and optimization services for New Zealand's industrial processes. From shell & tube to plate heat exchangers, we ensure efficient heat transfer while minimizing energy consumption and environmental impact.

{/* Heat Exchanger Services */}

Our Heat Exchanger Engineering Services

Comprehensive solutions for heat exchanger design, optimization, and operation

{heatExchangerServices.map((service, index) => (
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.description}

))}
{/* Heat Exchanger Types */}

Heat Exchanger Types & Applications

Specialized heat exchanger solutions for diverse industrial applications

{heatExchangerTypes.map((type, index) => (
{type.icon}

{type.title}

{type.description}

Applications:

  • {app}

))}
{/* Key Design Considerations */}

Key Heat Exchanger Design Considerations

Thermal Design

  • • Heat transfer coefficient calculation
  • • Temperature approach optimization
  • • Pressure drop analysis
  • • Fouling factor considerations
  • • Heat duty requirements

Mechanical Design

  • • Material selection and compatibility
  • • Pressure vessel design codes
  • • Thermal expansion considerations
  • • Maintenance and cleaning access
  • • Safety and environmental compliance
{/* Why Choose RMES for Heat Exchangers */}

Why Choose RMES for Heat Exchanger Engineering?

Technical Expertise

  • • Advanced heat transfer modeling
  • • Computational fluid dynamics (CFD)
  • • Thermal design optimization
  • • Energy efficiency analysis
  • • New Zealand regulatory compliance

Industry Experience

  • • Chemical processing plants
  • • Power generation facilities
  • • Food and beverage industry
  • • Oil and gas operations
  • • HVAC and refrigeration systems
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Optimize Your Heat Transfer Operations?

Contact our heat exchanger engineering experts to discuss your thermal requirements and get a customized solution.

Get Heat Exchanger Consultation
); }; export default HeatExchangerPage;
